sentences.en: a one-week intensive course in English
sentences.cn: 为期一周的英语强化课程

sentences.en: Boren surprisingly led off the most intensive line of questioning today.
sentences.cn: 博伦今天出人意料地一上来就开始连珠炮似地盘问起来。

sentences.en: Con-struction remains a relatively labour-intensive industry.
sentences.cn: 建筑业相对来说依然是劳动密集型的行业。

sentences.en: He was put on a life-support machine in intensive care.
sentences.cn: 在特护期间给他使用了生命维持设备。

sentences.en: I'll make an intensive study of a subject.
In " It's a bloody miracle! ", " bloody " is used as an intensive word.
sentences.cn: 在 “ It‘sabloodymiracle! ” 一句中, bloody是用作加强语气的词.

sentences.en: In my opinion, we must depend on intensive cultivation to feed ourselves.
sentences.cn: 我看我们就是要靠精耕细作吃饭.

sentences.en: Intensive care in hospital is given to the seriously ill.
sentences.cn: 病情严重的人在医院里得到了精心的护理.

sentences.en: Intensive farming in the area has caused severe degeneration of the land.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的集约化农业使得土壤严重贫瘠化。

sentences.en: She needed intensive care for several days.
sentences.cn: 她需要几天的特别护理。

sentences.en: She spent the night in intensive care after the operation.
sentences.cn: 手术后的那个夜晚她在重症监护病房度过。

sentences.en: Some books are for intensive study and some are for cursory reading.
sentences.cn: 有的书必须精读,有的只要稍加涉猎即可.

sentences.en: They secure their degrees by slogging through an intensive 11-month course.
sentences.cn: 他们苦学了11个月的强化课程，拿到了学位。

sentences.en: You have to do a year's intensive training to become a paramedic.
sentences.cn: 要接受一年的强化培训才能成为护理人员.

words.tran_cn: 强烈的；紧张的；非常的；热情的
增强器；增强剂；使更激烈之物
强度，烈度；加强，加剧；紧张
强度；强烈；[电子] 亮度；紧张
使加强，使强化；使变激烈
加强的；[经]集中的；透彻的；加强语气的

phrases.tran_cn: 能源密集型的；能源消耗量大的
n. 英语精读（课程名称）
精耕法；集约农业；密集农作

trans.tran_cn: 加强的，强烈的，[农]精耕细作的，[语]加强语意的，（农业方法）集约的，密集的
trans.tran_en: involving a lot of activity, effort, or careful attention in a short period of time
